sections.text: Term of reconducted nonagricultural leaseThe term of a reconducted nonagricultural lease is:(1) From month to month in the case of a lease whose term is a month or longer;(2) From day to day in the case of a lease whose term is at least a day but shorter than a month; and(3) For periods equal to the expired term in the case of a lease whose term is less than a day.Acts 2004, No. 821, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2005.
